feed.title: BookLore Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.5.0
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • Implement multi-select AND filter with count in UI (#252) by @adityachandelgit

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Make main dashboard vertically scrollable (#253) by @adityachandelgit

🛠️ Refactoring

  • Suppress noisy Spring boot logs, Hikari warnings, and clean Quartz/Hi… (#247) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for the Release (#254) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.6.1
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Use correct WebSocket protocol (wss) based on current page protocol (#264) by @adityachandelgit
  • Fix strictdiscoverydocumentvalidation error (#261) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for the Release (#265) by @adityachandelgit
  • Merge Develop into Master for the Release (#263) by @adityachandelgit
